duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and architecture of the ACTIMIZE AIS Module, Data Analytics, and Alert Ingestion process.
Development of Custom AIS plugins and scripting for Oracle Database.
Proactively develop and implement best practices in fraud detection and prevention.
Participate in production support and development activities for assigned applications and projects.
Collaborate with business and technology teams to propose optimal technology solutions and delivery approaches.
Contribute to the improvement of processes to increase application quality, development productivity, and effectiveness.
